description.label: Escalade sur partitions

description.tooltip: Configured lock escalation on partitioned tables
description.label: Escalation on partitions

queries.query: ;WITH PARTITIONNED_TABLE AS ( SELECT DISTINCT object_id FROM sys.dm_db_partition_stats WHERE partition_number > 1 ) SELECT S.name + '.' + T.name AS table_or_indexed_view_name , T.lock_escalation_desc , CASE T.lock_escalation_desc WHEN 'TABLE' THEN 'ALTER TABLE ' + S.name + '.' + T.name + ' SET (LOCK_ESCALATION = AUTO)' ELSE NULL END AS sql_change_lock_escalation_level FROM sys.schemas AS S INNER JOIN sys.tables AS T ON S.schema_id = T.schema_id INNER JOIN PARTITIONNED_TABLE AS PT ON PT.object_id = T.object_id;
